name: Tiny Mutant Axolotl
description:
Made during 7DRL 2022.

In this grid based action roguelite, you play an axolotl who enters the Crypt of the Pancaker to retrieve a mighty pancake (and eat it!)

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: move
  • X: fire a shuriken (consume two stamina)
  • Z: dash towards held direction (consume one stamina)
  • F11: toggle fullscreen

The ASCII mode shown in the last screenshot can be accessed by running the game from the command line with the "txt" argument.

Thanks for playing :)
